changeSet.author: srb55
changeSet.sql: insert into krim_perm_t (perm_id, obj_id, ver_nbr, perm_tmpl_id, nmspc_cd, nm, desc_txt, actv_ind) values (KRIM_PERM_ID_S.nextval,sys_guid(), 1, (select perm_tmpl_id from krim_perm_tmpl_t where nmspc_cd='KUALI' and nm = 'Default'), 'KFS-SYS', 'Maintain Favorite Account', 'Allows Manager to maintain other users favorite acccounts', 'Y') /
